114

Growing by itself from moss-covered compacted soil in open mixed oak woodland edge. 

Golden rhizomorphs attached to host Elaphomyces species (roughly 6 cm depth). 
- Nearby trees Northern Red Oak, Eastern Red Cedar, Black Oak, Roughleaf dogwood, and distant Chinkapin Oak. 
- Spore-bearing surface present.
